sections.heading: Dogs; running at large; penalty
sections.text: The owner of any dog running at large for ten days without a collar as required in section 54-605 shall be fined an amount not to exceed twenty-five dollars.SourceLaws 1877, § 7, p. 157;R.S.1913, § 178;C.S.1922, § 175;C.S.1929, § 54-607;R.S.1943, § 54-607;Laws 2008, L
